settings.name: Creatine Monohydrate
settings.description: The body's primary rapid-energy buffer. Supports cognitive performance under stress, working memory, and processing speed.

settings.name: MagteinÂ® (Magnesium L-Threonate)
settings.description: The only magnesium proven to cross the blood-brain barrier. Enhances synaptic density, plasticity, and memory formation.

settings.name: Vitamin D3
settings.description: A neurosteroid hormone with receptors throughout the brain. Supports neurotransmitter synthesis and neuroprotection.

settings.name: Sodium
settings.description: Drives neuronal action potentials and optimal hydration. Every thought depends on sodium gradients.

settings.name: Potassium
settings.description: Sodium's essential counterpart. Maintains resting membrane potential and enables neural repolarization.
